name: Super Duper Lemon Stand DEMO(Pre-Alpha)
description:
You need a way to buy the gaming computer parts you want. So what do you do? Build a lemon stand!
Start out with just a stand and some lemons and build up your empire. You can build signs, upgrade your stand, and much more! Watch as your town of lemons grows into a giant kingdom!
NOTE: BROWSER VERSION COMING SOON.
Disclaimer: This game is NOT DONE! We are currently working on new customer sprites, new areas, and new buildings. This is simply a DEMO
